attributes.name: MsBuild Making Network Connections v100.0.2
attributes.description: Identifies MsBuild.exe making outbound network connections. This may indicate adversarial activity as MsBuild is often leveraged by adversaries to execute code and evade detection.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
sequence by process.entity_id
  [process where process.name : "MSBuild.exe" and event.type == "start"]
  [network where process.name : "MSBuild.exe" and
     not cidrmatch(destination.ip, "127.0.0.1", "::1")]
